items.name: Common Carp
items.description: A common freshwater fish. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Golden Trout
items.description: A beautiful golden fish that only appears at dawn and dusk. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A small but feisty bass. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A common perch found in ponds. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A trout that lives in flowing rivers. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Catfish
items.description: A bottom-feeding catfish, more active at night. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A small sunfish that loves sunny days. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A small freshwater crustacean. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Minnow
items.description: A tiny minnow, easy to catch. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Bluegill
items.description: A common bluegill with distinctive coloring. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A small fish found in creeks and streams. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Rainbow Trout
items.description: A beautiful rainbow-colored trout. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A large bass that's most active at dawn and dusk. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Pike
items.description: A predatory pike with sharp teeth. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A walleye that hunts at night. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A strong salmon that fights hard. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A dangerous eel that can shock you. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Moonfish
items.description: A silvery fish that glows under moonlight. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.description: A crystalline koi that shimmers in the light. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Phoenix Fish
items.description: A fiery fish that appears at dawn. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Storm Sturgeon
items.description: A massive sturgeon that fights like a storm. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Leviathan Fry
items.description: A young leviathan, massive even as a fry. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: World Serpent Scale
items.description: A scale from the legendary World Serpent. Can be sold or used in cooking.

items.name: Faded Scroll
items.description: An ancient text mentioning a wyrm sleeping beneath the mountains. The writing is barely legible.

items.name: Dragon Scale Fragment
items.description: A fragment of an enormous scale. It radiates ancient power and whispers of a slumbering wyrm.

items.name: Wyrm Prophecy
items.description: A prophecy carved in stone: 'When scales are gathered and the prophecy found, the ancient one shall awaken.'

items.name: Shadow Realm Tome
items.description: A dark tome that speaks of a realm where shadows reign. It mentions a sovereign who rules when all light fades.

items.name: Midnight Fragment
items.description: A fragment that only appears at midnight. It seems to be part of something larger, something that grants passage to the shadow realm.

items.name: Shadow Crown Fragment
items.description: A fragment of a dark crown. When held at midnight, it resonates with the shadow realm, granting passage to the throne.
